snippet.title: Full Bloom - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Oh no! Bloom locked herself inside! Solve puzzles, clear minigames, and overcome obstacles to help her get out! 

Full Bloom is a cute (horror) adventure game. 

This trailer was featured in EEK3 2023: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NZ8IHoyXMBk (25:58)

Game Link (Steam): https://steampowered.com/app/2624090/
Game Link (itch): https://essarrgee.itch.io/full-bloom
Follow me on Twitter to get updates: https://twitter.com/esarrgee
My Linktree: https://linktr.ee/essarrgee
